Description.Metadata: Hot as sun [sound recording] : a tribute to the Beatles.
Back in the U.S.S.R. -- I'm happy just to dance with you -- And your bird can sing -- All together now -- I'll keep you satisfied -- Bad to me -- I'll be on my way -- Step inside love.
Performed by the Original Marauders, in the style and manner of the Beatles.
